title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building the future with AWS Serverless (CNS211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 无服务器构建未来 (CNS211)
abstract: Want to build and ship to customers faster than ever? Want to see a smile on your developers faces as they build SaaS applications, web apps, or event driven apps that delight end-users? Then swing by this session and see what's possible when infrastructure "disappears"! Discover how AWS Serverless transforms ideas into production applications at unprecedented speed, delivering enterprise governance and cost control by default. In this demo-rich, high-energy session, watch us build an application in just 30 minutes using newest innovations announced this week. In this session, you will experience our developer-first enterprise-ready strategy firsthand: exceptional performance, automatic availability, and intelligent cost optimization, while your team focuses purely on business logic.
abstract_cn: 想要比以往更快地构建和交付给客户？想要看到开发人员在构建令最终用户满意的SaaS应用程序、Web应用程序或事件驱动应用程序时脸上的笑容？那就来参加这个会议，看看当基础设施"消失"时会有什么可能！了解AWS Serverless如何以前所未有的速度将想法转化为生产应用程序，默认提供企业治理和成本控制。在这个演示丰富、高能量的会议中，观看我们使用本周宣布的最新创新在短短30分钟内构建一个应用程序。在这个会议中，您将亲身体验我们的开发人员优先的企业就绪策略：卓越的性能、自动可用性和智能成本优化，同时您的团队纯粹专注于业务逻辑。

presenter.name: Usman Khalid
presenter.title: Director and Head of AWS Serverless Compute
